class_notes: This class meets synchronously MW, with asynchronous materials on Fridays.
course_description: Prerequisite: RUSS 201 or consent of instructor. Continuation of 201 -  Focus on more advanced grammatical and syntactical constructions both in written and spoken Russian. Supplemented by multimedia exercises and materials.
sections: Class Nbr: 2344, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: E. Glazov-Corrigan, Status: Open
